section.heading: Self-administration of medication by program participants.
section.text: A program participant may self-administer medication provided that:

para.text: The program participant has been assessed by a registered nurse to have the ability to self-administer medication;
The self-administration of medication is monitored; and

The program participant’s self-administration skills include, but are not limited to, orientation to time, knowledge of quantities and proper storage, and understanding of possible medication reactions.
